cast.name: 丹尼尔·约翰斯顿 Daniel Johnston

this_title: The Angel and Daniel Johnston: Live at the Union Chapel
introduction: In July 2007 Daniel Johnston makes a highly acclaimed appearance at London’s Union Chapel, described by the Evening Standard as “nothing short of breath-taking”. Daniel delivers renditions of favourites from the breadth of his career, such as True Love Will Find You in the End, Walking the Cow and Some Things Last a Long Time. New songs such as Mean Girls… and Try to Love are introduced and there are some hitherto overlooked gems such as Go and Living Life.
chinese_title: The Angel and Daniel Johnston: Live at the Union Chapel
